name: x-timeago
description: Simple web component that displays dates as relative timestamps (e.g. "4 minutes ago").
author: David Hirtz

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/timeago.js && esbuild dist/timeago.js --minify --outfile=dist/timeago.min.js && cp dist/timeago.min.js docs/timeago.min.js
